chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : prechain bool) (d : preDTA), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) p -> sas_chain bool (ensemble_base state d) lem p

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
sas_chain : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
Inductive prechain (A : Set) : Set := single : Map A -> prechain A | concat : prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A For prechain: Argument scope is [type_scope] For single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
preDTA = Map state : Set
lemd = fun (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) => ensemble_base state d m0 /\ ensemble_base state d m1 /\ lem m0 m1 : preDTA -> mRelation bool
state = Map prec_list : Set
lattice_lemd_bounded_3 : forall (p : prechain bool) (d : preDTA), chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) p -> chain bool (ensemble_base state d) lem p
lattice_lemd_bounded_0_def = fun p : prechain bool => forall d : preDTA, chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) p -> chain bool (ensemble_base state d) lem p : prechain bool -> Prop
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
lattice_bounded_def_0 = fun p : prechain bool => forall (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p) : prechain bool -> Prop
lattice_bounded_10 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (p : prechain bool), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m) lem p -> chain_length bool p <= S (MapCard A m)
predta_coacc_increasing : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), increasing_app bool (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a)
predta_coacc_states = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
predta_coacc_states_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
map_maxi_maxi : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)
map_mini_mini : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mini bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x)
lattice_bounded : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), bounded_sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A x) lem (S (MapCard A x))
mlattice : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mLattice bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x) (map_maxi A x)
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0...
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem m0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m0) (H1 :...
prec_list_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true
prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true -> prec_list_ref_ok p d
map_replace_inc : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), lem m0 m1 -> lem (map_replace bool m0 a b) (map_replace bool m1 a b)
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
lattice_lemd_bounded_1_def = fun p : prechain bool => lattice_lemd_bounded_0_def p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_lemd_bounded_0_def (concat bool p m) : prechain bool -> Prop
lattice_bounded_def_1 = fun p : prechain bool => lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m) : prechain bool -> Prop
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
lem_get_leb : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b0 b1 : bool), lem m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some b0 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some b1 -> leb b0 b1
lattice_lemd_bounded_2 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_lemd_bounded_1_def p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_lemd_bounded_1_def (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_3 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_2 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (concat bool p m)
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
lem_domain_equal : forall m0 m1 : Map bool, lem m0 m1 -> domain_equal bool bool m0 m1
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
state_ref_ok_check = fix state_ref_ok_check (s : state) (d : preDTA) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ p => prec_list_ref_ok_check p d | @M2 _ x y => state_ref_ok_check x d && state_ref_ok_check y d end : state -> preDTA -> bool
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
map_or_mapget_true_l : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_r : forall (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), domain_equal bool bool m0 m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m1 m0) a = Some true
map_replace_inc_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad) (b : bool), lemd d m0 m1 -> lemd d (map_replace bool m0 a b) (map_replace bool m1 a b)
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t

```proof
intros p d Hchain.
apply lattice_lemd_bounded_3 in Hchain.
apply Hchain.
```

original: proof intros p d Hchain. apply lattice_lemd_bounded_3 in Hchain. apply Hchain.
